name: src/esound.js
Sound
description: A small class to represent a sound. Has useful API to handle the sound

unknown.tagValue: { Sound } - A sound object that has vast API on controlling it

params.name: pSoundPath
params.description: The path of the sound file

params.name: pVolume
params.description: The volume of the sound

params.name: pStartTime
params.description: The start time of this sound (to play a clipped version)

params.name: pEndTime
params.description: The end time of this sound (to play a clipped version)

params.name: pSave
params.description: Whether to save this sound, or recycle it when it's completed

params.name: pPlayUnfocused
params.description: If this sound is set to playUnfocused then it will not be played automatically when the game screen is not focused

params.name: pPlaybackRate
params.description: The rate at which the sound is played, Higher numbers for faster playback (MAX 10)

params.name: pLoop
params.description: Whether this sound should loop or not

params.name: pCallbackObject
params.description: Object full of callbacks to call (soon to be deprecated and replaced with on('event') handlers)

params.name: pCallbackObject.onStarted
params.description: Callback for when the sound has started playing

params.name: pCallbackObject.onStopped
params.description: Callback for when the sound has stopped playing

params.name: pCallbackObject.onEnded
params.description: Callback for when the sound has ended

params.name: pCallbackObject.onSuspended
params.description: Callback for when the sound has been paused

params.name: pCallbackObject.onResumed
params.description: Callback for when the sound has been resumed

return.description: A sound object that has vast API on controlling it

name: volume
description: Gets the current volume of this sound

unknown.tagValue: {number} The current volume of this sound

return.description: The current volume of this sound

name: volume
description: Sets the volume of this sound

params.name: pNewVolume
params.description: The volume to set

name: toggleMute
description: Toggleable mute feature for this sound. Flips between muted and unmuted

name: loop
description: Get the loop status of this sound

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} Whether this sound is set to loop or not

return.description: Whether this sound is set to loop or not

name: loop
description: Set the loop status of this sound

params.name: pLoopValue
params.description: The value which to set the loop status to. Truthy values resolve to true, and falsely values resovle to false

name: toggleLoop
description: Toggleable loop feature for this sound. Flips between loop and unlooped

name: playbackRate
description: Get the playback status of this sound

unknown.tagValue: {number} The playback rate of this sound

return.description: The playback rate of this sound

name: playbackRate
description: Set the playback status of this sound

params.name: pNewPlaybackRate
params.description: The value which to set the playback status to. Clamped to 10

name: info
description:
Set the info of this sound
The new value is not used, as this is a "read-only" variable. So any attempts to set it will not work

params.name: pNewInfo
params.description: The new value

name: info
description: Get the info object of this sound

unknown.tagValue: {Objecct} The info object of this sound

return.description: The info object of this sound

unknown.tagValue: { Sound } - A sound object that has vast API on controlling it

params.name: pSoundPath
params.description: The path of the sound file

params.name: pVolume
params.description: The volume of the sound

params.name: pStartTime
params.description: The start time of this sound (to play a clipped version)

params.name: pEndTime
params.description: The end time of this sound (to play a clipped version)

params.name: pSave
params.description: Whether to save this sound, or recycle it when it's completed

params.name: pPlayUnfocused
params.description: If this sound is set to true then it will not be paused automatically when the game screen is not focused

params.name: pPlaybackRate
params.description: The rate at which the sound is played, Higher numbers for faster playback (MAX 10)

params.name: pLoop
params.description: Whether this sound should loop or not

params.name: pCallbackObject
params.description: Object full of callbacks to call (soon to be deprecated and replaced with on('event') handlers)

params.name: pCallbackObject.onStarted
params.description: Callback for when the sound has started playing

params.name: pCallbackObject.onStopped
params.description: Callback for when the sound has stopped playing

params.name: pCallbackObject.onEnded
params.description: Callback for when the sound has ended

params.name: pCallbackObject.onSuspended
params.description: Callback for when the sound has been paused

params.name: pCallbackObject.onResumed
params.description: Callback for when the sound has been resumed

return.description: A sound object that has vast API on controlling it

name: load
description: Loads this sound and stores its data so future sounds can use the same buffer

name: pause
description: Pauses this sound

name: resume
description: Resumes playing this sound

name: stop
description: Stops this sound from playing

params.name: pState
params.description: The current state of this sound. It's used to figure out if a callback should be dispatched

name: play
description: Plays this sound

params.name: pResume
params.description: If this is being played from a paused state

name: restart
description: Restarts this sound

name: canPlayUnfocused
description: Get whether this sound will play when the window is unfocused

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} Whether or not this sound will play when the window is unfocused

return.description: Whether or not this sound will play when the window is unfocused

name: kill
description:
Kills this sound. Wipes it, and recycles it if the recycle manager isn't full.
If the recycle manager is full, this sound will become an empty class instance.

name: wipe
description: Resets this sound to default state

name: getCurrentTime
description: Get the current timestamp of the sound playing

unknown.tagValue: {number} The current timestamp into the sound

return.description: The current timestamp into the sound

name: fade
description: Fades this sound to the specified volume in the specified duration via the specified ease

params.name: pVolume
params.description: The volume to fade to

params.name: pDuration
params.description: The duration of the fade in ms

params.name: pEase
params.description: Easing function

params.name: pCallback
params.description: Callback to be called when the fade is over

name: queuedFade
description: Start the queued fade

name: ESoundManagerSingleton
description: Class for managing sounds

unknown.tagValue:
ESound does not have a license at this time.
For licensing contact the author

https://github.com/doubleactii
Copyright (c) 2023 Evitca Studio

Safari does not support .ogg files, so if you are using safari, do not use .ogg files or this library will not play that sound on safari.
Otherwise, you can use .ogg on any other platform. Cordova included. This supports mp3, wav, ogg, etc.

name: MAX_VOLUME
description: The max volume to be used

name: MIN_VOLUME
description: The min volume to be used

name: MAX_RECYCLED_SOUNDS
description: The max number of sounds that can be recycled

name: MAX_PLAYBACK_RATE
description: The max speed this sound can be played at

name: FRAME_RATE
description: The frame rate at which to fade the sounds

params.name: pVal
params.description: Value to clamp

params.name: pMin
params.description: Minimum value

params.name: pMax
params.description: Maximum value

params.name: pValue
params.description: The number to normalize within a range

params.name: pMin
params.description: The min number

params.name: pMax
params.description: The max number

params.name: pRange
params.description: The range to normalize within

name: audioCtx
description: The audio context all audio will dervie from

name: gainNode
description: Gain node

name: soundsPlaying
description: Array of sounds that are currently playing

name: pausedSounds
description: Array of sounds that are currently paused

name: recycledSounds
description: Array of sounds that can be resused

name: queuedSoundsToPlay
description: Array of sounds that are queued for playing

name: queuedSoundsToFade
description: Array of sounds that are queued for fading

name: loadedBuffers
description: An object that stores the buffer data of a sound so it does not have to be loaded each time

name: fader
description: An object that stores fade information

name: volume
description: The master volume

name: muted
description: Mute status

name: state
description: Current state of the library

name: canPlaySound
description: Function to check whether this library can play a sound at a given moment.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} Whether a sound can be played or not.

return.description: Whether a sound can be played or not.

name: adjustVolume
description: Function to adjust master volume

params.name: pVolume
params.description: The number to change the volume to

name: fade
description: Fades this sound to the specified volume in the specified duration via the specified ease

params.name: pVolume
params.description: The volume to fade to

params.name: pDuration
params.description: The duration of the fade in ms

params.name: pEase
params.description: Easing function

params.name: pCallback
params.description: Callback to be called when the fade is over

name: toggleMute
description: Master mute

name: isMuted
description: Checks if the sound manager is currently muted

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} Whether the sound manager is muted

return.description: Whether the sound manager is muted

name: emit
description: Plays a sound that is not stored. Plays the sound only. You can only kill this sound, no repeat, no changing volume, etc

unknown.tagValue: {SoundSource } The source to this emitted sound. Call source.kill() to stop this sound while its playing. This is the only API this sound has

params.name: pSoundPath
params.description: The path to the file

params.name: pVolume
params.description: The volume to play the sound

params.name: pStartTime
params.description: The start time of this sound (to play a clipped version)

params.name: pEndTime
params.description: The end time of this sound (to play a clipped version)

params.name: pPlaybackRate
params.description: The rate at which the sound is played, Higher numbers for faster playback (MAX 10)

return.description: The source to this emitted sound. Call source.kill() to stop this sound while its playing. This is the only API this sound has

unknown.tagValue: { Sound } - A sound object that has vast API on controlling it

params.description: The path of the sound file

params.description: The volume of the sound

params.name: pSave

params.name: pPlayUnfocused
params.description: If this sound is set to true then it will not be paused automatically when the game screen is not focused

params.name: pPlaybackRate
params.description: The rate at which the sound is played, Higher numbers for faster playback (MAX 10)

params.name: pLoop
params.description: Whether this sound should loop or not

params.name: pCallbackObject.onStarted
params.description: Callback for when the sound has started playing

params.name: pCallbackObject.onStopped
params.description: Callback for when the sound has stopped playing

params.name: pCallbackObject.onEnded

name: stopAllSounds
description: This effectively stops all sounds in the game except those specified in the pException array

params.name: pException
params.description: an array of sounds that should not stop

name: killAllSounds
description: This effectively kills all sounds in the game and subjects them to be recycled

name: pauseAllSounds
description: Pauses all sounds in the game

params.name: pFocus
params.description: If this function was called automatically by the game being unfocused

name: resumeAllSounds
description: Resumes all sounds in games

params.name: pFocus
params.description: If this function was called automatically by the game being focused

name: unloadSound
description: Removes the loaded audio buffer data for this sound

params.name: pSoundPath
params.description: The path of the sound file

name: recycleSound
description: Recycles the sound for reuse later instead of deleting it. All binding info on the sound is removed

params.name: pSound
params.description: The sound to recycle

name: resumeAudioCtx
description:
This will start playing sounds that were initially blocked by not having a user gesture.
This will also restart sounds when a mobile device backs out of an app, and then rejoins the app

content:
# ESound
A plugin that will easily allow you to play sounds and control them.

#INCLUDE SCRIPT esound.min.js

**🚧🚧 Docs coming soon 🚧🚧**
